author: Reuters Editorial
title: Fairvest Property Says ‍HY Profit Before Tax 148.2 Mln Rand
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Fairvest Property Holdings Ltd:
* ‍INTERIM DIVIDEND DISTRIBUTION OF 9.806 CENTS PER SHARE FOR SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍HY PROFIT BEFORE TAXATION 148.2 MILLION RAND VERSUS 127.1 MILLION RAND​
* ‍HY REVENUE INCREASED BY 15.2% TO R186.9 MILLION​ * HY ‍NET ASSET VALUE INCREASED BY 12.0% TO R1.93 BILLION COMPARED TO R1.72 BILLION AT 30 JUNE 2017​
* ‍”AS OUTLOOK FOR SOUTH AFRICA IMPROVES, EXPECT TO SEE IMPROVED TRADING PERFORMANCE FROM TENANTS”​
* ‍REMAINS CONFIDENT CO SHOULD BE ABLE TO ACHIEVE DISTRIBUTION GROWTH OF BETWEEN 9% AND 10% FOR FULL 2018 FINANCIAL YEAR​ Source text for Eikon:
